<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Populates the 'entered_time' field of 'sn_cda_profile_trigger' records so the jobs run at the correct time in the time zone</description>
        <name>Set entered time for CA Profile Trigger</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[populateEnteredTime();

function populateEnteredTime() {
	var gr = new GlideRecord('sn_cda_profile_trigger');
	gr.addNullQuery('entered_time');
	gr.query();
	
	while (gr.next()) {
		gr.setValue('entered_time', gr.getValue('run_time'));
		gr.setValue('time_zone', 'floating');
		gr.update();
	}
}
]]></script>
